comments: Comment on anything. Comments are private.

en-GB.intro_p1: is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily. It uses cloud storage to enable users to store and share files and folders with others across the Internet using file synchronization.

en-GB.dropbox_notactivated_error: Tradeshift app was not activated in Dropbox
en-GB.activate_token_error: Error activating Tradeshift app, please, try again
